array.string: Click on savings button in home
Enter principal amount
Enter interest
Enter compounds per year
Enter payments per year
Then the future value will be automatically calculated
If you need to re-calculate the future value clear the field and system will calculate the future value again
If you need to calculate the principal amount, interest or payments per year do the steps by filling the rest of the fiels reamining the required field you need to calculate
Click on save button to save to history
Click on mortgage button in home
Enter loan amount
Enter interest
Enter number of years
Then the payment will be automatically calculated
If you need to re-calculate the payment clear the field and system will calculate the payment again
If you need to calculate the loan amount, interest or number of years do the steps by filling the rest of the fiels reamining the required field you need to calculate
Click on save button to save to history

dict.string: How to calculate compound loans and savings?

array.string: Click on compound loans in home
Enter present value
Enter interest
Enter payment
Enter compunds per year
Enter number of payments
Select end switch
Then the future value will be automatically calculated
If you need to re-calculate the future value clear the field and system will calculate the future value again
Click on save button to save to history
Click on savings button, mortgage button or compound loans and savings button
Then from the navigation panel select history
Select the history item to view the details
